value: content=The Museum contains a model of Merv and objects displayed from Victor Sarianidi's excavations at the Bronze Age sites of
and Togolok in the northern part of the Merv oasis and  discoveries from Sasanian-Islamic times at
. In the upper floor Turkmen carpets, a display of household items, everyday, wedding and ceremonial clothings and a fully decorated yurt are exhibited.
